description: Welcome home! Situated on a high-floor of one of the top luxury doorman condominiums in the area, you have all you need right at home. The apartment is a very large studio, 600 square feet in total. Gourmet kitchen with gas range and dishwasher. Washer/dryer in unit. Bathroom has a large soaking tub and shower. The views from the apartment are stunning and the building has a pool, roof deck, and gym.
name: Luxury High-Floor Oversized Studio w/ Park View
